text: <#C2YGWHDKQ|marketplace> any help here would be appreciable
Hi everyone, is this the right channel for asking public app related questions?

<@U056ZR8LVJQ> thanks for the thumbs up :smile:
My question is, I've requested access to the private custom objects OAuth access:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/custom-objects-schema-pilot>

This is very important for us because we have a public app that's growing and customers are all asking for custom reports which we cannot achieve without a custom object. I'm wondering how long the process will take and who I should refer to in the dev team? There is no indication of response timeline on the landing page.

Appreciate it :pray::skin-tone-3:
Reported your query in a different internal channel on our instance. Hopefully you will get more information/clarification soon.

Hi, <@U044BTK3EGP>. Thanks for submitting the form and for your patience. Our SLA is usually a couple business days, especially since you submitted over the weekend.

You submitted your developer account Hub ID, `144589278`, twice rather than specifying app IDs as instructed. However, I'm guessing you want "Simple Time Tracker" (ID: `3561326`) and "Simple Time Tracker (STT) [Staging]" (ID: `3770934`) to have access, so I've gone ahead with that assumption. Please see your email for next steps.

Hello <@UDDJG2VFG>, thank you so much, I really appreciate it.
Sorry for putting in the submission wrong :sweat_smile:

Perfect, those are the apps that I'm working on indeed!
Thanks again for the quick reply - stoked to start developing with custom objects.
